name: Only One Left (bubak)
description:
A terrible tragedy! Earth has been hit by an asteroid!

Can you prevent it?

You are stationed on a Moon base. As the only survivor of humanity, you need to save your home by going back. Thankfully, the Moon is full of chrono-particles - time altering particles. Because of that, the base is mostly used for time-travel experiments. Maybe you could use the time machine to go back and warn Earth?

Game made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2
